select DATA_ID, DATA_CODE, SYS_FLAG, DATA_ORDER, STATUS, DEL_FLAG, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, CREATE_USER_NAME, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_USER_NAME, PROJECT_CODE, PROJECT_ID, PROJECT_NAME, AUDIT_STS, UNIT_CODE, UNIT_NAME, UNIT_ID, ENGIN_NAME, ENGIN_CODE, ENGIN_ID, REMARKS, WORKFLOW_STATE, WBS_NAME, WBS_CODE, WBS_ID, COMPACT_NAME, COMPACT_CODE, SUPERVISION_UNIT_NAME, SUPERVISION_UNIT_CODE, SUPERVISION_UNIT_ID, BUILD_UNIT_NAME, BUILD_UNIT_CODE, BUILD_UNIT_ID, REDACT_UNIT_NAME, REDACT_UNIT_CODE, REDACT_UNIT_ID, REDACT_DATE, WORK_ORDER_NAME, WORK_ORDER_CODE, WORK_ORDER_START_DATATIME, WORK_ORDER_END_DATATIME, WORK_ORDER_PLAN_START_DATATIME, WORK_ORDER_PLAN_END_DATATIME, IMPLEMENTATION_PROGRAM, ANNOUNCEMENTS, WORK_ORDER_TYPE, WORK_ORDER_STATUS, WORK_ORDER_ALLOT_USER_NAME, WORK_ORDER_ALLOT_USER_ID, PARENT_ID, JS_ID, ZP_NAME, BL, XBR, bak1, bak2, bak3, bak4, bak5, bak6 from plan_base where 1=1
and DATA_ID like '%${dataId}%'
and DATA_CODE like '%${dataCode}%'
and SYS_FLAG like '%${sysFlag}%'
and DATA_ORDER like '%${dataOrder}%'
and STATUS like '%${status}%'
and DEL_FLAG like '%${delFlag}%'
and CREATE_DATE like '%${createDate}%'
and CREATE_USER like '%${createUser}%'
and CREATE_USER_NAME like '%${createUserName}%'
and UPDATE_DATE like '%${updateDate}%'
and UPDATE_USER like '%${updateUser}%'
and UPDATE_USER_NAME like '%${updateUserName}%'
and PROJECT_CODE like '%${projectCode}%'
and PROJECT_ID like '%${projectId}%'
and PROJECT_NAME like '%${projectName}%'
and AUDIT_STS like '%${auditSts}%'
and UNIT_CODE like '%${unitCode}%'
and UNIT_NAME like '%${unitName}%'
and UNIT_ID like '%${unitId}%'
and ENGIN_NAME like '%${enginName}%'
and ENGIN_CODE like '%${enginCode}%'
and ENGIN_ID like '%${enginId}%'
and REMARKS like '%${remarks}%'
and WORKFLOW_STATE like '%${workflowState}%'
and WBS_NAME like '%${wbsName}%'
and WBS_CODE like '%${wbsCode}%'
and WBS_ID like '%${wbsId}%'
and COMPACT_NAME like '%${compactName}%'
and COMPACT_CODE like '%${compactCode}%'
and SUPERVISION_UNIT_NAME like '%${supervisionUnitName}%'
and SUPERVISION_UNIT_CODE like '%${supervisionUnitCode}%'
and SUPERVISION_UNIT_ID like '%${supervisionUnitId}%'
and BUILD_UNIT_NAME like '%${buildUnitName}%'
and BUILD_UNIT_CODE like '%${buildUnitCode}%'
and BUILD_UNIT_ID like '%${buildUnitId}%'
and REDACT_UNIT_NAME like '%${redactUnitName}%'
and REDACT_UNIT_CODE like '%${redactUnitCode}%'
and REDACT_UNIT_ID like '%${redactUnitId}%'
and REDACT_DATE like '%${redactDate}%'
and WORK_ORDER_NAME like '%${workOrderName}%'
and WORK_ORDER_CODE like '%${workOrderCode}%'
and WORK_ORDER_START_DATATIME like '%${workOrderStartDatatime}%'
and WORK_ORDER_END_DATATIME like '%${workOrderEndDatatime}%'
and WORK_ORDER_PLAN_START_DATATIME like '%${workOrderPlanStartDatatime}%'
and WORK_ORDER_PLAN_END_DATATIME like '%${workOrderPlanEndDatatime}%'
and IMPLEMENTATION_PROGRAM like '%${implementationProgram}%'
and ANNOUNCEMENTS like '%${announcements}%'
and WORK_ORDER_TYPE like '%${workOrderType}%'
and WORK_ORDER_STATUS like '%${workOrderStatus}%'
and WORK_ORDER_ALLOT_USER_NAME like '%${workOrderAllotUserName}%'
and WORK_ORDER_ALLOT_USER_ID like '%${workOrderAllotUserId}%'
and PARENT_ID like '%${parentId}%'
and JS_ID like '%${jsId}%'
and ZP_NAME like '%${zpName}%'
and BL like '%${bl}%'
and XBR like '%${xbr}%'
and bak1 like '%${bak1}%'
and bak2 like '%${bak2}%'
and bak3 like '%${bak3}%'
and bak4 like '%${bak4}%'
and bak5 like '%${bak5}%'
and bak6 like '%${bak6}%'
order by ${iSortCol} ${sSortDir_0}
